metadata.title: CVE-2020-6802 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Mozilla Bleach before 3.11, a mutation XSS affects users callingbleach.clean with noscript and a raw tag in the allowed/whitelisted tagsoption.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-bleach - 3.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-bleach package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-1').
